name: Rita's Spinach Casserole
author: KSBEESON
summary: This is a quick and delicious way to get kids to eat spinach! Ground beef and tomato sauce are layered in a casserole with spinach and mozzarella cheese.
ingredients: 3 ½ cups farfalle (bow tie) pasta, uncooked
1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Bring a pan of lightly salted water to a boil
Add the pasta, and cook until tender, about 8 minutes
Crumble ground beef into a skillet over medium-high heat
Cook, stirring constantly until evenly browned
Drain excess grease, and stir in the tomato sauce, sour cream and thyme
Place the cooked pasta into the bottom of a 2 quart casserole dish
Pour the ground beef mixture over the pasta
Cover with a layer of spinach
Bake for 30 minutes in the preheated oven, until heated through and lightly browned on the top
